text:
Arif-ur-Rehman Alvi (; born 29 August 1949) is a Pakistani politician. He is the 13th and current President of Pakistan since 9 September 2018.<ref name="nawaiwaqt/3sept2018"><ref name="pildat/dob">
He was a member of the National Assembly of Pakistan from June 2013 to May 2018 and again from August to September 2018. He was a founding member of Pakistan Tehreek-i-Insaf (PTI).
Alvi was elected as President of Pakistan on 4 September 2018 following the presidential election.
